game.title: Dragon's Lair
game.description: Travel towards the mountains in the East, into the dragon's lair. Your mission is to slay the dragon and bring back its heart as proof.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and the Dragon Slayer title

task.description: Visit the blacksmith and collect your weapons to take down the dragon
Travel into the mountains towards the East to find the dragon's lair
Engage in battle with the dragon and bring back its heart as proof
